    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_twilio_direct.NotifyTwilioModifyCallRecipe</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>NotifyTwilioModifyCallRecipe</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var NotifyTwilioModifyCallRecipe = Class.create();
NotifyTwilioModifyCallRecipe.prototype = Object.extendsObject(BaseNotifyTwilioCallRecipe, {
    initialize: function() {
		BaseNotifyTwilioCallRecipe.prototype.initialize.apply(this, arguments);
    },
	
	onStart: function (callSid, notifyActionJson, actionRecord) {
		this.data.callId = callSid;
		this.data.actionRecordSysId = actionRecord.getUniqueValue();
		this.saveData();

		var api = new TwilioApi();
		var resp = api.modifyCall({call_sid: callSid, action_url: this.getTwimlUrl('onModifyCall')});
		if (resp.error)
			gs.error('Could not modify the call {0} with action {1} due to error {2}',
					 callSid, notifyActionJson, resp.error);
	},

	onModifyCall: function (p) {
		// TODO add call status
		return this.getTwimlFromAction(this.finishWaitingActivities(null, true, this.data.actionRecordSysId));
	},
	
    type: 'NotifyTwilioModifyCallRecipe'
});]]></script>
